whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: Professionalism, proximity and commitment to real results

reason1.title: Strategy-Driven Design
reason1.description: Our team with training in marketing and business administration delivers a digital asset that solves business problems, not just aesthetic design.

reason2.title: 100% Local, Direct Service
reason2.description: We know the D√©nia and Marina Alta market. Close, personalized treatment without intermediaries.

reason3.title: Instant Visual Credibility
reason3.description: We combine Professional Web and Photography with high-quality images (not generic) so your website is authentic, reliable and generates immediate trust.

reason4.title: Guaranteed Delivery Times
reason4.description: Photos edited in 24-48h so your project moves forward without delays. Speed without sacrificing professional quality.

reason5.title: Total Satisfaction Guarantee
reason5.description: Your investment is protected. We re-edit FREE (up to 3 times) until you are 100% satisfied. No risk, no fine print.

reason6.title: Post-Launch Strategic Support
reason6.description: We don't just deliver the website, we provide proactive maintenance so your investment stays secure, updated and running perfectly.

bestPrice.title: Best Quality-Price
bestPrice.description: Professional services at fair and transparent prices. No hidden costs or surprises.

noRefunds.title: We Re-edit for Free
noRefunds.description: We don't give refunds, but we re-edit FREE up to 3 times until you're 100% satisfied.

process.title: How We Work With You
process.subtitle: Simple and transparent process in 3 steps

step1.title: Tell Us Your Project
step1.description: We chat with you to understand what you need: website, photography, or both. No technical jargon, just clear solutions.

step2.title: We Create Your Solution
step2.description: We design your website and/or conduct the photo session. We work with you until it's perfect.

step3.title: We Launch and Support You
step3.description: We publish your project and teach you how to manage it. We remain available for whatever you need.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real testimonials from businesses that trusted us

testimonial1.name: Mar√≠a G.
testimonial1.text: I hired the photography service for my real estate agency and the photos turned out amazing. Every property looks much better with professionally edited images. Clients congratulate me on the quality.

testimonial2.name: Robert M.
testimonial2.text: I needed a professional website for my vertical service company. The team delivered an excellent bilingual site that works perfectly. Very responsive and professional.

testimonial3.name: Ana L.
testimonial3.text: At first I didn't give much importance to having a website for my gym, but I was surprised by the number of people who contact us through it. Now it's my best customer acquisition tool.
